sec.p:
We model the change in CH 4, N 2O and SLCFs by using the fraction of each emissions species from each sector in 2008 in the Emissions Database for Global Atmospheric Research (EDGAR) v4.2 database
67, 68 (Supplementary Table 3). SLCFs act as tropospheric ozone and aerosol precursors and include SO 2, CO, non-methane volatile organics, nitrous oxides, black carbon, organic carbon, and NH 3. For the phase-out scenarios, the change in non-CO 2 emissions is shown in Supplementary Figure 2.
